name: PROJECTED_THERAPY_MINUTES
description: The PROJECTED_THERAPY_MINUTES table contains information about the Speech-Language Pathology, Occupational Therapy, and Physical Therapy minutes projections for a given resident in your Long Term Care facility.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: THERAPY_PROJECTION_DATE
columns.description: This item records the date for which a set of therapy projections applies.

columns.name: SLP_PROJECTED_MINUTES
columns.description: This item records the number of minutes projected for Speech-Language Pathology services on a given date.

columns.name: OT_PROJECTED_MINUTES
columns.description: This item records the number of minutes projected for Occupational Therapy services on a given date.

columns.name: PT_PROJECTED_MINUTES
columns.description: This item records the number of minutes projected for Physical Therapy services on a given date.
